name: Featured Image from External Sources
author: Ond≈ôej Dadok

sections.description:
Fastest way to choose Featured Image to your Posts from Yahoo.com, Seznam.cz, etc..

Showcase

Even for the blind. The plugin also allows a blind user to enter a keyword to find a number of thumbnail suggestions and send this selection to the seeing assistant by e-mail. The assistant simply clicks on the best photo directly in the email and the photo is safely added to the article as Featured Image.

Link to YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=CPXuRy5Eb_c

WARNING: All images & photos from commercial sources have reserved rights, so don’t use them without a valid license! Author of this plugin are not liable for any damages arising from its use.
sections.installation:
1. Upload plugin-name.php to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
